descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][size=6][b][u]Vega[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]
[i][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ea9999](Falling Star)[/color]

[/font][/i][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#e06666][size=3]The stories say that there exists a young woman born out of a vampire raid on Breton village.  Some people believe that her name is Vega...[/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4rkroo4cn/20160727130607_1.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][/center][left][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Name: Vega
Race: Breton/Vampire Mix
Location: Morthal - Moorside Inn
Voice: Female Sultry
Marriageable: yes
Height: .98
Weight: 100
Body: UUNP Custom (Built w/ HDT) / UNP & CBBE Now Available 
Skin: Fair Skin
Armor:  Black UNP Ranger Armor / UNP & CBBE have Daedric Reaper Armor
Jewelry: Various KS Jewelry
Weapon: Aegis Shield & Sword of the Golden Army (Ghosus Weapon Pack) w/ Nord Hero Bow / UNP & CBBE have Daedric Weapons, No Shield)

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF

Level with Player.  Strength of a vampire without the obvious vampire weaknesses.[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/db45mfcp3/20160727130802_1.jpg[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=3][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]REQUIREMENTS:[/font]

[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPSME Skeleton
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]   (for body built in Bodyslide)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels[/url] (for Ranger Outfit)

UNP /  CBBE Version - No known requirements (Your favorite BBP/TBBP skeleton if you want bounce on the body)


[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][size=3]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]
FaceLight[/url] (used in screenshots)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There

[/url][/left][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][size=3]INSTALLATION:

[/size][/color]Manual or your favorite mod manager

[color=#ff0000][size=3]UNINSTALL:

[/size][/color]Manual removal of all Vega files/folders or use your favorite mod manager removal process.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]MANY THANKS TO:

[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make a Follower Kit[/url] (for making this possible)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url] (for putting up with me & for testing)
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url] (for moral support & advice)

[size=3][color=#ff0000]CREDITS/RESOURCES/PERMISSIONS:

[/color][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77215/?]UNP Ranger Armor
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]KS Jewelry[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's - Renewal
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76089/?]YevMods - Makeup Pack
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20343/?]RANs Eye Reflection Extender[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28545/?]Ghosus Weapon Pack
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677/?]The Coenaculi - RaceMenu Plugin For Tattoos
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]Stoja's Warpaints
[/url][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Bethesda (of course)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/?]Daedric Reaper Armor[/url] (on UNP/CBBE versions)

*I used many aspects of various mod authors so if I forgot anyone please kindly remind me.  Thank You*

[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][size=3][i]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:
